GSET_ID = 29; Changed parameter PI.SPECIALDELIVERY from 1 to 0 for the call to
26.03.2004 SH SCR5806 BPH253D Changed CND to perfrom module, has to be done

- wrong DEBC_NO, which will be used in BPH255G and BPH255F.

11.07.2003 SH Changed only some descriptions

- parameter PI.BTCH_BATCHCODE

- amount" which called in part BPH253F, see R.S., to book the interest amount,
- calculated by BPH115, if CLNT318_WWWACK= false

- for execution the part where INVOICE_UNBOOKED will be stored.
14.05.2003 SH SCR3517 BPH253B Call BPH122 for calculation the exchange

08.05.2003 SH SCR3505 BPH255C Removed updates of CMOC_CURRBALFACTACC and
- CMOC_CURRBALSPECIALACC
28.04.2003 SH SR3326 Extended test for BPH255G with ADML_TYPE <> 47 or if
- no ADML row exists.

- also some CND in BPH253A, BPH254A/C/D and BPH255C/D are extended with
-- GNRL_BATCHIDAUTOCOLLECTION
25.02.2003 SH SCR3062 BPH255G Extended CND to execute BPH255G with
- 'and BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE <> GNRL_BATCHIDMOVEDINVOICES'

07.02.2003 SH SCR2950 BPH253D --> extende CND with BTCP_STORNO_BTCH_ID to
- execute BPH253D
1. BPH253C Changed test if BTPC_AMOUNTCURRH > 0 to <>0
2. BPH253E Before the main part of BPH253E will be called set BTPC_PAYS_ID =
PYSA_PAYS_ID if there is a row in PYSA, see alos new SPECS
03.12.2002 SH BPH255G Call BID019 to store DUNL row, instead of storing
- a dunning letter directly with BPH255
13.11.2002 SH Disable all GB002 calls if currencies identical and update the
- virtuals with the original value
10.10.2002 SCR2083 SH BPH253A Update BTPC_DATVALUECLIENT always with
- BTCP_VALUEDATEPAYMENT or in special cases with --> see SCR2083
09.10.2002 SH Changed arguments for BPH113 according to SPECS and selected new
- field BTPC_DEBC_NO
30.09.2002 SH Removed 15 arguments for call to BPH254 which only stored values
- for the deleted INVA row in BPH254B1--> Directive from JDO
30.09.2002 SCR2083 SH BPH254A Diff. changes calcul. of value date
16.09.2002 SCR 2163 SH BPH253C --> Call BPH113 only if BPIV rows exist with
- BPIV_LEDG_NO = 0
11.09.2002 SCR2146 SH (increase performance)
1. BPH255E will be only called in CLNT_212_INTERCREDIT = 'N'
11.09.2002 SCR2144 Get ACCC_CHANGENUMBER with GB003 now
10.09.2002 JJ SCR2017 cont. fixed bug in condition to fetch new no.
09.09.2002 SCR1967 SH BPH253G enlarged some tests
04.09.2002 SH BPH253C/BPH253D mult argument PI.AMOUNTCURRPAY
- with *-1 for call to BPH113 BTCP_BADP_ID
//04-09-2002 JP change param #4 to BXA052 form DATCASHREPROT to BTCH_ID
//03-09-2002 JP SCR #2090 add BPH255I = update BTPC_STATUS = 2
28.08.2002 JJ SCR2017 255E isolated fetching of new ACC lineno in no lock task
22.08.2002 SH Changed call to BPH113 to BPH113_NEW. The new BPH113 does not
make updates to the physical tables BTCP/BTPC which are openend here in
WRITE-MODE. BPH113_NEW send the changed values for BTCP/BTPC back as parameter
20.08.2002 SCR1968 SH Add new argument if BPH254 will be called - BTPC_PYSA_DATE
16.07.2002 SCR1614 SH Removed updates to balance fields in BPH255A, will be now
- made with BPH264C
28.03.2002 SH Implement BPH121 in BPH253E, new program to calculate
- new invoicenumber
-- SCR#557 18.01.2002 SH ( new program BPH255H)
-- SCR#698 29.01.2002 SH (I removed BPH255B, needed to Update
CLIENT_MONTH_DAY)
-- SCR#699 30.01.2002 SH (New program BPH255F)
-- SCR#737 04.02.2002 SH (Extended storing of INVOICE_UNBOOKED with
INVU_DEBC_NO = DLIT_DEBC_NO)
sort on BTPC_ADMNO and BTPC_CLNTNO
// For calculation of bankcosts
-- Uses for BPH253A
-- Uses in BPH253B/BPH255Q
-- Uses in BPH255I
-- Global virtuals, initialized only once
- Used in BPH253A
-- Uses in BPH253F "Caculate daly interest"
-- Used in BPH254C "Calculating bank costs"
-- Uses in BPH255A
-- Uses in BPH255I
-- Uses in BPH255Q
-- uses to check if payment is fully handled, if not job turns to MSGW
-- Check if the received amount is fully handled, if not then turn job to MSGW
-- Get max(BTPC_LINENO) uses in BPH255A
-- reset for BPH 253 C Calculate bankcosts
-- reset for BPH255A
// BPH 253 A Calculate the value date
-- Set number of days which uses for the calc of the value date by BPH126
... set value date = GNRL_ACTIVEDATE if null or< 01.01.2000
-- 21.03.2006 SH SCR10673 Disabled module
// BPH 253 C Calculate bankcosts
-- If bankcosts = 0 check bankcosts for foreign payments/cheques
-- Use BTCP_AMOUNTCOSTSCURRACC for bankcosts if higher then the calculated bank
costs by BPH109 (V.AMOUNTBANKCOSTS)
// BPH 253 D Charge bankcosts, only for the first BTPC row
-- The following updates allow storno without double costs
-- BPH253E Update PAYMENT SCHEDULE
-- BPH 253 F Calculate delay interest
... reset variables
... calculate interest
... in case of interest calculated further handling is required by BAD210
-- BPH 253 G Check direct payment, only for where BTPC_LINENO = 1, otherwise
for every BTPC row, which belongs to one BTCP row a row will be written to MQ
-- Part 1: Check if the payment came from a client account
-- Part 2: Inform the client manager that letters have to be sent
-- Part 3: Dircet payment came from AV debtors
-- Part 4: Inform client on the cashreport
-- BPH253H - Check upfront interest period 3 booked off
-- BPH253I - Check upfront interest period 3 paid invoices
-- BPH254 BATCH_PAYMENT_INVOICE level
-- BPH255A Calculate the exchange difference
-- Perform the following modules only if a client exists for the current BTPC row, because
of using GB902 for recalculations into client currency
// BPH 255 E Update ACCOUNT_CHANGES
// BPH 255 F Activate 'SILO' module
// BPH 255 G Handle payment letters/ files for lawyers
// BPH 255 H Modify BPIV_CASHREORTDATE for every BTPC
// (see --> SCR#557 18.01.2002 S. Huppertz)
//BPH255Q - Final updates
... check if there exists for all related BPIV rows a ledger number, if TRUE
then BTPC_STATUS = 4
... to BTPC
... do not print debit amounts on the cashreport (direct payments)
... update special sort field which uses to print the cashreports (BXA003)
... update special sort field which uses to calc the transfer costs (BPH400)
(uses to combine BTPC rows with diff. batch codes)
... to BTCH
-- Report payment to lient department (MQ115)
(in case of country DE, the clients have to be only informed for delcredere
administrations)
-- Payment difference no action (MQ135)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(BTPC_AMOUNTCURRPAY) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/btpc where BTPC_BTCH_ID = :2 and BTPC_BTCP_LINENO = :3 for fetch only
select cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRPAY) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/bpiv where BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = :3 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Search for payment schedules if unknown
-- Update payment schedules if already known
... update via amounts
... update via invoice number
@Task stops cycle on PAYS, if a payment schedule is determined in the following
two parts 1A/1B
... continue with part 2 (update payment schedule via amounts)
... continue with part 3 (update payment schedule via invoive number)
... recal interest amount
...move v.BPH121.PO.INVOICENO to BPIV_INVO_INVOICENO
-- Select last row just made with BPH 113, update BPIV_INVO_INVOICENO
(With this invoicenumber the interestamount will be booked as a new invoice)

FormName.valUnicode: Book interest amount as nw inv

Text.val: -- EndTaskCondition = If PIO.BTCP_RCVDFROMCLIENT becomes 'Y', means if a row was
selected and CLBA414_BANKID = BTCP_BANKIDDEBTOR and
CLBA414_BANKACCOUNT = BTCP_BANKACCOUNTDEBTOR
-- Payment was originated by the client

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRPAY) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/BPIV where BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = :3 and BPIV_BTPC_LINENO = :4 and BPIV_INVO_NO = 0 for fetch only

select cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRPAY) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/BPIV join :1/INVO on INVO_NO = BPIV_INVO_NO and INVO_CODINTERESTINVOICE = 'Y' where BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = :3 and BPIV_BTPC_LINENO = :4 and BPIV_INVO_NO > 0 for fetch only
select cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/bpiv where BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = :3 :4 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Switch system langauge to client language
-- Switch back to user langauge, if system language was changed, see T.P.
-- Additional updats on BTPC level
-- Get new ACCC_CHANGENO if a new ACCC row will be created
-- only if there exists at least one BPIV row
-- Report to the payment handling department for checking in case of too high
payment differeneces
-- Reset virtual
-- A.Verification is no longer required, all invoices are paid/booked off
-- B. Check invoices if verification is still required, all invoices are paid/booked off
-- Updates if verification is no longer required
... 2. Update CLIENT_MONTH / CLIENT_MONTH_COUNTRY
... BID007 is called in G.S. CRDB_DATEADDED
... after final database updates, probably done in G.P. of CRDB_DATEADDED

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) as NO_INVO, cast(sum(abs(INVO_AACTUALI)) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO join :1/DCVI on DCVI_DCLV_DEBC_NO = :2 and DCVI_DCLV_DATVERIFICATION = ':3' and DCVI_DCLV_VERIFCODE = 1 where INVO_NO = DCVI_INVO_NO for fetch only
select MQDT_DEPT_CODE, MQDT_USRID, MQDT_MQTY_ID, MQDT_LINENO from :1/MQDT where MQDT_MQTY_ID = 1 and MQDT_DEBC_NO = :2 and MQDT_DATE = ':3' for fetch only;

Text.val: -- Update parameter only to prevent multiple execution of this task, see CND
-- where this task will be called
We check if there is a BPIV row for a draft invoice, so MF, join end yes after
If there is a least one draft invoice, add 2 value days
